DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , placebo-controlled , randomize , double-blind trial . Patients 5-12 year old , healthy , need dental treatment local anesthesia Lidocaine 2 % adrenalin 1:100,000 Hadassah School Dental Medicine take part study . The dental treatment include one follow procedure : restoration , pulpotomy , pulpectomy , stainless steel crown , extraction . Exclusion criterion : preoperative pain , patient take analgesic within 5 h prior dental treatment , allergic reaction adverse effect paracetamol , available ( phone ) least 2 hour treatment , patient refuse drink syrup . Study group receive syrup paracetamol 15 min dental treatment . Control group receive placebo syrup , similar color viscosity , 15 min dental treatment . patient , treat dentist , interviewer blind medication . Data collection : age , gender , type treatment , type LA ( infiltration /block ) , time take preoperative analgesic , type preoperative analgesic ( 1 2 ) , time end treatment baseline apprehension . Baseline anxiety record prior procedure use Facial Image Scale .
